<JD_START>
Job Title: Associate Manager, Business Administration

Location: Huntersville, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Company Overview

Newell Brands is a leading $8.5B consumer products company with a portfolio of iconic brands such as Graco®, Coleman®, Oster®, Rubbermaid® and Sharpie®, and 28,000 talented employees around the world. Our high-performance culture, unparalleled curiosity about the world around us, and

talented people fuel our success. Our culture is enabled through our core values which guide all we do and how we win as One Newell. They are Integrity, Teamwork, Passion for Winning, Ownership & Leadership.

Position Summary

As an Associate Sales Tools Business Analyst, you will be part of a team focused on delivering enterprise cloud technology solutions. The ideal candidate will possess a unique blend of business acumen and technical expertise, working at the intersection of technology and sales to optimize processes, tools, and systems. You will wear many hats and support critical activities including requirements capturing, configuration, testing, training, and post-deployment support. Our Business Analysts work alongside senior team members to help design, develop, and deploy large-scale enterprise solutions all while learning and growing your abilities.

Responsibilities

Requirements Gathering and Documentation

Collaborate with sales leaders and stakeholders to understand business objectives, challenges, and opportunities related to sales operations.Conduct thorough needs assessments to identify technology requirements that align with sales goals and strategies.Create detailed requirements documentation, user stories, and acceptance criteria to guide the development and implementation of technology solutions.

Technology Assessment

Evaluate existing technologies, tools, and systems used by the sales team.Research and recommend new technologies/solutions that can enhance the sales process, improve productivity, and drive revenue growth.

Solution Design and Implementation

Develop comprehensive technology solutions based on business requirements.Assist in solutioning and configuring user storiesCollaborate with IT teams to implement, configure, and customize systems to meet the specific needs of the sales team.Participate in the delivery of solution demosSupport System Integration Testing and User Acceptance TestingDocument and complete deployment steps for Go LiveProvide support post Go Live

Data Analysis and Reporting

Utilize data analytics to identify trends, track key performance indicators (KPIs), and provide insights that inform decision-making within the sales function.Design and generate reports to monitor the effectiveness of sales tools and technologies.

User Training and Support

Conduct training sessions for sales teams on the effective use of technology tools and systems.Provide ongoing support, addressing user issues and ensuring the smooth operation of sales-related technologies.

Continuous Improvement

Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in sales enablement.Proactively identify opportunities for process improvement and efficiency gains.

Key Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree in Business, Information Technology, or a related field.2+ years experience as a Business Analyst, Sales Operations Analyst, or in a similar role.Strong understanding of sales processes and the ability to translate business needs into technology solutions.Familiarity with CRM systems, sales automation tools, and other sales-related technologies.Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.Project management skills and the ability to manage multiple initiatives simultaneously.

_Newell Brands (NASDAQ: NWL) is a leading global consumer goods company with a strong portfolio of well-known brands, including Rubbermaid, Sharpie, Graco, Coleman, Rubbermaid Commercial Products, Yankee Candle, Paper Mate, FoodSaver, Dymo, EXPO, Elmer’s, Oster, NUK, Spontex and Campingaz. We are focused on delighting consumers by lighting up everyday moments. Newell Brands and its subsidiaries are Equal Opportunity Employers and comply with applicable employment laws. EOE/M/F/Vet/Disabled are encouraged to apply.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
